description:
I wanted to see what would happen if I put a straight guy, a bi guy, and a gay guy together. What I got was far hotter than I had imagined.
Heath and Braden took turns tag-teaming Conner from every position they could think of. I was able to get up close and film their hot dicks sliding in and out of Conner’s tight hole.
Heath and Braden made a good team — and a very verbal one at that. After the moves they made, it wouldn’t surprise me if Conner had a very uncomfortable flight back home.
At the very end, something happened in the showers that would not make our cleaning lady very happy! But, boys will be boys!
title: Heath, Conner, & Braden
